Description:
PN - 312084310 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health and safety of your employees in that you have failed to ensure that risk from electrical ignition sources are either eliminated or reduced so far as reasonably practicable, namely your Greaves Optidrive E3 Agitator.

PN - 312084311 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health and safety of your employees in that you have failed to ensure that risk from electrical ignition sources are either eliminated or reduced so far as reasonably practicable, namely your GNB Industrial Power Series 3 Motive Power battery charger.
